name: National Labor Relations Board
description: As a business owner, Pres. Trump has been involved in labor disputes that potentially could be brought to the National Labor Relations Board for intervention. Since taking office, he has appointed board leaders who have come under scrutiny for perceived business-friendly ties and potential ethics violations.

stories.headline: Trump Organization Moves to Avoid Possible Conflicts of Interest
